content.rendered:
Join Our Affiliate Program to Boost
Your Business and 10X Your Profits

Earn 10% Monthly Commission
With our exclusive affiliate program, you can delve into affiliate marketing in Los Angeles and earn on all orders and future upgrades for the lifetime of your clients. Start expanding your business and grow your income now.

Get Your Proposal Today

You Win

With our Affiliate Program, you earn a remarkable 10% monthly commission for the lifetime of your client. It’s not just a partnership; it’s a financial reward that keeps giving and empowering your business infinitely.

Clients Win

Your clients deserve the best, and that’s precisely what they get with Shyft Digitally. They gain access to the expertise of Los Angeles most trusted digital marketing agency, receiving custom solutions to 10X their online growth.

We Win

By welcoming new clients who appreciate our services, we can recommend even more effective solutions. And guess what? You still earn 10% of all their future upgrades. It’s a symbiotic relationship where everyone wins.

THE SOLUTION

How Does Shyft Digitally Affiliate Program Work?

We value personal, genuine, word-of-mouth referrals. That’s why we’ve created a top-notch affiliate marketing agency program, prioritizing your referred clients and rewarding you for every new client without any hassle or complicated procedures.

Setup a Call with Your Client

Step #1

Your referrals mean the world to us. That’s why, we link your clients with our sales experts, ensuring a smooth transition to expert consultations in just a few clicks.

Get Full Sales Support

Step #2

Our experienced team engages with your clients, understanding their needs, and recommending optimal solutions backed by real case studies.

We Do All the Work

Step #3

With over 11 years of industry expertise, we excel at providing effective services and strategic upgrades to boost your client’s businesses and revenue.

10% Monthly Commission

Step #4

Enjoy a steady stream of passive income as you earn a 10% monthly commission for your client's lifetime. Plus, access exclusive promos, flash sales, and training sessions.

What’s Included in the Shyft Digitally Affiliate Program?

Comprehensive Marketing Plan

Gain access to email content, sales call scripts, case studies, and presentations to effortlessly promote our services and boost your business.

Expert Sales Closing Support

Enjoy top-notch phone sales assistance, ensuring effective nurturing and closure of leads with a remarkable 93% client satisfaction rate.

Exclusive Booking Links & Discount Codes

Provide your clients with unique booking links and special offers, enhancing their experience and maximizing your earnings beyond our standard website offerings.

Steady 10% Monthly Recurring Revenue

Earn a lifetime 10% revenue share from your referred clients, translating to estimated earnings between $26,000 to $83,000 in the first 1 to 3 years.

Automated Payments & Client Invoicing

Our automated billing system manages client invoicing and ensures your 10% shared revenue is paid out seamlessly.

Resources and Training

Access tons of resources, including presentations, case studies, and educational videos, enabling you to represent our services accurately. .

Full Concierge Services

Receive monthly reports, strategic calls, and exceptional phone support, ensuring unparalleled service quality for your clients.

Hassle-Free Process for All

Let us take care of it all - from sales presentations and follow-ups to onboarding. Your clients receive top-quality digital marketing services.

Exclusive Deals & Sales Material

Exclusively for our affiliate and referral partners, we offer private coaching sessions to enhance your sales and digital marketing expertise.

Book Your Proposal Today

Frequently asked questions (FAQ)

See the answers to some of our most commonly asked questions below.

How Does Our Affiliate & Referral Program Work?

Our referral program is simple: introduce businesses in your network to our services. When they subscribe, you earn a 10% monthly commission for the lifetime of the client. You can recommend any of our 20+ services, from SEO to Google Ads.

Do I Need To Be Involved With the New Clients?

Yes, it's crucial to establish a connection. You'll introduce them and engage in the first call. We handle follow-ups, closing deals, and commission earnings, ensuring a hassle-free experience for you.

Can my Affiliate Account be Canceled?

Inactive partners may have their accounts canceled. To maintain active status, generate a minimum of one paid referral every three months. If canceled, you'll still receive commissions for six months. You can also cancel your partnership anytime.

How Much is the Reward for Affiliate Referral Partners?

Earn a 10% monthly commission for your client's lifetime. We provide a user-friendly dashboard to track your commissions, future payouts, and exclusive offers.

How do I Qualify for This Program?

We seek individuals with 1+ years in marketing, trusted in their local market, possessing excellent communication and sales skills. This program is for active partners referring clients monthly. One-time referrals are appreciated with a one-time fee as a thank you.
